Text: Well what can i say? The torrent is abosolutely pointless. The fucking subs are hardcoded onto the VideoTS file. Plus the main menu of it's in fucking dutch. This torrent has to be the worst "dvdrip" i've ever fucking seen. Fucking hell. Wish someone else would've commented on this shit before me.
Also since there is NO edit on this thing. 4GB of data downloaded all wasted. B/c some guy doesn't know how to fucking make a menu. Or tell the truth.
